courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals

courses.description: Master advanced chords, solos, and fingerstyle techniques for guitar.

courses.description: Understand notes, scales, chords, and harmony to improve your musical skills.

courses.description: Learn rhythm, timing, and basic drum patterns for beginners.

courses.title: Vocal Training 101

courses.description: Learn easy chords and strumming patterns to play fun songs on ukulele.

courses.description: Create electronic music using modern DAWs, synths, and mixing techniques.

courses.title: Songwriting Masterclass
